meanings.sent1: The company is hyping their new product to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys hyping up events to make them more exciting.
meanings.sent3: The kids were hyping each other up before the big game.
meanings.sent4: The politician was hyping his achievements to gain more votes.
meanings.sent5: The artist was hyping her upcoming exhibition with colorful posters.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or excessive promotion or publicity
meanings.sent1: The hyping of the movie led to high expectations among the audience.
meanings.sent2: The hyping of the event caused a lot of buzz in the community.
meanings.sent3: The hyping of the dessert made it seem like the best treat ever.
meanings.sent4: The hyping of the concert made it a must-see event for music lovers.
meanings.sent5: The hyping of the book created a lot of anticipation among readers.
